full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SPRUL BA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAndI TA NO MON KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B CES SPRUL BA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAndI TA NO MON KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA CIG DGOS ZHES DPON AER TE NI CHING DBANG DANG, GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI SLOB DPON GRVA RIGS, PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,DBUS TZED THO YON, AA CHI THU DAR RGAN NANG SO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS SMRAS PA'O, ,
